title: Chris Fowler Decodes the College Football Playoffs
description: ESPN Sportscaster Chris Fowler talks with Chuck Todd about the BCS and the College Football National Championship, and considers what would happen if the Bowls began moving to the pre-season.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
